text:
Need svn to be a core task of ant so that cross platform builds work with no
external libraries.
creator: mickyw@williamsonhouse.com

text:
This will probably be a wontfix, because (a) we're improving how Ant loads
external libraries. More subtly, CVS, like SVN, hands off to native
applications...it has dependencies out there.
creator: stevel@apache.org

text:
As we are factoring more and more optional tasks out into AntLibs, this is
against this policy. Therefore I mark this as WONTFIX as Steve suggested.
creator: jan@materne.de
